title: Who Won the 2021 NBA Draft? | The Answer
description:
Late Thursday night, Chris is joined by J. Kyle Mann and Wos to recap the 2021 NBA Draft. They discuss the Draft's biggest surprises (0:57), Golden State picking Jonathan Kuminga (4:00), and Orlando's draft (11:08). Then, they get into the the Russell Westbrook trade (27:19) before breaking down some of the obvious picks of the draft (32:26).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: J. Kyle Mann and Wosny Lambre
Producer: Carlos Chiriboga
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
